|                |    1     |      2       |
| Beverage       |  Coffee   |   Tea         |
| Food           |  Broccoli | Spinach   |
| Hobby          | Board-games| Chess        |
| Movie-Genre    |  Action    |   Sports      |

  
Puzzle Solution:

1. The person watching action movies is not to the right of the person eating spinach. This means that either both are in the same position, or the person eating spinach is to the right of the person watching action movies.
2. The person eating spinach is somewhere to the left of the person who's hobby is board-games. This implies that the person with the hobby of board-games is in an odd position.
3. The person drinking coffee is in an even position.

Final Solution:

1. Action |  Sports
2. Coffee |   Tea
3. Broccoli| Spinach
4. Board- games| Chess
